content: Looking at draft USCDI v3 why is is BB Coverage.type undefined? Was there discussion around candidate value sets for type? CC @Brett Marquard
Perhaps @Mark Roberts @Pat Taylor or @Amol Vyas may know?

@Brett Marquard The data element was not identified in the list of data elements required for this use case. However, in light of the USCDI v3 data elements, the CARIN team may want to consider defining it @Amol Vyas @Corey Spears
.. or make a comment to ONC why it was not identified as necessary.
